parameters.name: sPath
parameters.description: Binding path for the element displaying the tasks within the Inbox. This path is the Task Collection according to the TCM (Task Consumption Model)

parameters.name: oOFilter
parameters.description: Predefined filter that is applied to the Task Collection before displaying the tasks in the Inbox. (sap.uiext.inbox.InboxFilters)

parameters.name: oOSorter
parameters.description:
{sap.ui.model.Sorter}Predefined sorter that is applied to the Task Collection before displaying the tasks in the Inbox. By default the tasks are sorted on 'CreatedOn' , descending, according to TCM.

The sorter is not validated for the path being a valid TCM Entity Property. The sorter passed will be applied to the oData service as is. In case the entity Property in the path is a sortable property on the UI, the sorter indicator for that property will be visible.

methods.description: Bind the Inbox Task Collection

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new InboxLaunchPad. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. If the name of a setting is ambiguous (e.g. a property has the same name as an event), then the framework assumes property, aggregation, association, event in that order. To override this automatic resolution, one of the prefixes "aggregation:", "association:" or "event:" can be added to the name of the setting (such a prefixed name must be enclosed in single or double quotes). The supported settings are:
  • Properties
    • {@link #getTitle title} : string (default: 'Inbox Launch Pad Title')
    • {@link #getLogoSrc logoSrc} : string
    • {@link #getShowLogoutButton showLogoutButton} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowUserName showUserName} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getUserName userName} : string
  • Aggregations
    • Associations
      • Events
        • {@link sap.uiext.inbox.InboxLaunchPad#event:tileSelected tileSelected} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
        • {@link sap.uiext.inbox.InboxLaunchPad#event:logout logout} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
